title: New: V R R E E B – We Were Above The Sun
body:
**V R R E E B** (an anagram of REVERB, clever, huh?) are the latest act attempting to bring about a much needed shoegaze revival, dubbed nu-gaze by critics.

Waves of **Slowdive** inspired guitars with unrefined vocals plastered hazily over the top, it’s anthemic in a way that early shoegaze could only have dreamed of. Four minutes isn’t much to go on, but it’s certainly a worthwhile outing from the UK based group. Check it out below.
